scripts.say: Captain, we're home~ How're things going?
Hey, Matsuri! You were gone for so long I was starting to worry. Nice to see Fubuki and Mio made it in one piece!
Look at that, Matsuri's back! Good timing, we just finished testing Aqua's rigging. Oh, guessing you brought some friends with you?
Sure did! This here's Shirakami Fubuki, and this is Ookami Mio.
And then the girls who got them out of a tight situation: Kawakaze and Zuikaku. The Resistance grows stronger!
Welcome aboard, folks! We've got fun and games!
You... I remember you, Purifier!
I can take your head in the blink of an eye at this range!
Wait, wait, WAIT! Calm down, you two!
What, Javelin?
Purifier's... lost her memories?
Yeah. I was pretty shocked too when she came in and blew up all the mass-produced Sirens attacking us...
Then I went and saved Aqua and Matsuri and brought them here.
... You're not pretending to be on our side, are you?
She's a Siren. After all the Sirens have done, I'm not going to simply take her word for it.
You have to believe us! Purity would never hurt anyone! You must be confusing her for someone else who looks like her!
I couldn't believe it at first either, but Purifi– I mean, Purity really did save us, and she's on our side...
Uhh, have I horribly wronged some of you in the past? I mean, if you want us to prove our allegiance, I can go out back and commit double suicide with Tessy. We can always get new bodies.
Who's "Tessy"? Wait... Tester's here too?!
Yup... Anyway, we need to come up with a plan for what to do next.
I'll stay with Purifi– Purity, and keep an eye on her.
Thank you, Kawakaze!
These are abnormal circumstances, and I'm willing to accept abnormal things within reason. But don't get careless, Javelin.
Phew, you had me spooked for a second there, Kawakaze... So, all friends here, yeah?
No, this is merely a ceasefire. I'm– Hey, stop that! Why are you measuring them, Purifier?!
Uh, so I can make them some rigging too? Surely getting more people equipped to search for their friends is more important than keeping their 3 measurements a secret?
Search for their friends? There are more than just Fubuki, Mio, Aqua, and Matsuri?
We still haven't found Ayame, Shion, or Miss Sora yet. Wherever they are, I hope they're okay.
Ayame has her demon powers and Shion can use magic, so they're probably fine. Miss Sora, on the other hand... Well, it's Miss Sora, I'm sure she can manage!
Maybe they can, but we're not gonna just leave them to fend for themselves out there.
Sounds like a plan! You girls with riggings go out and look for the last three while yours truly stays behind. Somebody's gotta kit out Fubuki and Mio, after all.
This could end up becoming a drawn-out battle, so we should probably try to collect resources when we can...
Gathering resources is my middle name! Leave it to Lady Aqua~
You girls should take a break, and I'll prepare you some hefty lunches in the meanwhile.
Aww, you're so sweet, Javelin. You'll make a lovely wife one day...
(Once we're back home, I'd better get the rest of the gang to play AL. For now though, time to rest...)
